abstract: Federal Communications Commission raises $44.9 billion in its airwaves auction, far beyond forecasts.
lead_paragraph: The auction, wireless carriers’ largest opportunity to get access to new airwaves since 2008, began on Nov. 13, and bids soared past the reserve price of $10.1 billion in the first week.
snippet: The auction, wireless carriers’ largest opportunity to get access to new airwaves since 2008, began on Nov. 13, and bids soared past the reserve price of $10.1 billion in the first week.

headline.main: Federal Airwave Auction Brings in $44.9. Billion
headline.print_headline: Federal Airwave Auction Brings in $44.9. Billion
